## Load Libraries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load Friends Birthdays CSV File
```{r}
birthdays <- read.csv('Friends_Birthdays.csv',
                      header = T, 
                      row.names = 1, 
                      check.names = T)
```

## How many people share your birthday?
```{r}
birthdays$Birthdate <- strptime(birthdays$Birthdate,
                                format = "%m/%d/%y")
row.names(birthdays)[birthdays$Birthdate == '2018-02-18']
subset(birthdays, Birthdate == '2018-02-18')
```

## Which month contains the most number of birthdays?
```{r}
birthdays$month <- as.numeric(format(birthdays$Birthdate,"%m"))
ggplot(data = birthdays, aes(x = month)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 13), breaks = seq(0, 13, 1)) +
  xlab('Month') +
  ylab('Number of Friends')
ggsave('BirthdayMonthHistogram.png')
```

# Which day of the year has the most number of birthdays?
```{r}
birthdays$day <- as.numeric(format(birthdays$Birthdate,"%d"))
ggplot(data = birthdays, aes(x = day)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 32), breaks = seq(0, 32, 1)) +
  xlab('Day') +
  ylab('Number of Friends')
ggsave('BirthdayDayHistogram.png')
```

## Do you have at least 365 friends that have birthdays on everyday of the year?
```{r}
ggplot(data = birthdays, aes(x = day)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 32), breaks = seq(0, 32, 1)) +
  facet_wrap(~month) +
  xlab('Day') +
  ylab('Number of Friends')
ggsave('BirthdayDayByMonthHistogram.png')
```
